subject: Coaches and Managers
Football (College)
Blacks
Hiring and Promotion
lead_paragraph: The dearth of black head coaches — there are 11 among the 128 teams in the Football Bowl Subdivision, according to an accounting — has exasperated many observers.
snippet: The dearth of black head coaches — there are 11 among the 128 teams in the Football Bowl Subdivision, according to an accounting — has exasperated many observers.
